title: Analyze the project's Dart code.
description: Run "flutter help analyze" for additional details.

verbose.description: Noisy logging, including all shell commands executed.

currentPackage.description: Analyze the current project, if applicable.

watch.description: Run analysis continuously, watching the filesystem for changes.

write.description: Also output the results to a file. This is useful with "--watch" if you want a file to always contain the latest results.

suggestions.description: Show suggestions about the current flutter project.

pub.description: Whether to run "flutter pub get" before executing this command.

congratulate.description: Show output even when there are no errors, warnings, hints, or lints. Ignored if "--watch" is specified.

preamble.description: When analyzing the flutter repository, display the number of files that will be analyzed.

fatalInfos.description: Treat info level issues as fatal.

fatalWarnings.description: Treat warning level issues as fatal.
